founder.title: Why we started Louhen
founder.body: Our twins needed their first shoes, but the store had long queues, rushed fittings, and only length and width to go by. We wanted parents to know how a shoe will feel before checkout, to compare styles side-by-side, and to shop when it fits their schedule. Louhen brings precise measurements, LouhenFit coverage, and curated looks so every pair feels like it was made for your child.
founder.headline: Our story began with twins
founder.p1: When our twin boys, Louis and Henry, took their first steps, we wanted to find them the perfect shoes. A physiotherapist recommended a small local store, and while the owners were kind, the experience was stressful: long waits with impatient kids, just two shoe options, and only basic measurements of length and width.
founder.p2: That day we realized how much guesswork parents face when shopping for children‚Äôs shoes. We thought: there must be a better way ‚Äî one that makes fit effortless and choice inspiring.
founder.p3: That‚Äôs why we built Louhen: an app designed by parents, for parents ‚Äî where every recommendation feels thoughtfully tailored, healthy feet are always the priority, and shopping is calm instead of chaotic. To honor our beginnings, we created the Twins Welcome Voucher: 5% off every order for twin parents.
